ModName.Chinese: 议员和平 尚·拉福图

Description.Chinese: 在多人游戏中，玩家2到4也会像玩家1一样，从和平开始走向新世界海盗 尚·拉福图。(这个修复包括在我的更强的海盗mod)
Description.English: In multiplayer the players 2 to 4 will also start with peace towards the new world pirate La Fortune, just like player 1. (this fix is included in my Stronger Pirates mod)
Description.French: In multiplayer the players 2 to 4 will also start with peace towards the new world pirate La Fortune, just like player 1. (this fix is included in my Stronger Pirates mod)
Description.German: Im Multiplayer haben jetzt auch die menschlichen Spieler 2 bis 4 zu Beginn Frieden mit dem neue Welt Piraten La Fortune, wie Spieler 1 es hat. (Dieser Fix is in meinem Stronger Pirates Mod enthalten)
Description.Italian: In multiplayer the players 2 to 4 will also start with peace towards the new world pirate La Fortune, just like player 1. (this fix is included in my Stronger Pirates mod)
